titleStmt.title: Miracles revived in the discovery of the Popish Plot by the late reverend Dr. of Salamanca

notesStmt.note: This item appears at reel 1466:12 incorrectly identified as Wing M2209, and at reel 1750:12 as Wing O11.
Imperfect: print show-through with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of originals in Chetham's Library, and the Bodleian Library.
